attributes.background: Since Brexit isn’t really working out for us. The least the British people deserve is a well loved and admired person like Drake to represent our nation. I let Theresa May do many things to this country that I didn’t agree with but ENOUGH IS ENOUGH! LET DRAKE IN and leave the EU if you want.

rejection.details: Drake doesn't appear to have applied for British Citizenship. We're therefore not exactly sure what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
